评论详情: Bought for my daughter and she loves it. Very heavy and warm.
Item was a gift and came as described. Love the design.

I ordered this sweatshirt in a size S for my 16yo son who saw it and immediately was like, meh. The material is not cozy or soft, its kind of rough. Also, it's hard to clearly see and decipher the writing on the front "written in the stars." It runs on the larger side as well- the M is pretty big on him (he's 5'5" 130 lbs). For $29.99 I would expect better quality.
